A blender with customizable blending speed control would provide more options for blending different types of ingredients, allowing for a more versatile cooking experience.
The blender could have a built-in timer to ensure precise blending times for specific recipes, eliminating the need for manual monitoring.
A temperature control feature would allow for hot blending, making it possible to make both hot and cold beverages in the same appliance.
A touch controls interface or voice assistants integration would make controlling the blender even more convenient and user-friendly, especially for those with limited mobility.
The blender could have a compartment for storing smaller blending cups and attachments, keeping them organized and within reach.
